unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Which is Random?
question_text: Lots of things happen to us in daily life which may or may not be random.  Of the following $5$ situations, which would you say is a random event?

choices.text: The price of your groceries at the checkout.
The television show on  ABC tonight at 9 9 pm.
Whether the street light at the next intersection will turn green.
Whether a baseball player gets a hit in the game tonight.
